mapper.insert:
insert into t_sensor_alarmreport(ip,sensorId,sensor_type,position,maxvalues,maxtime,avgvalue,starttime,endtime,times,status,measures,measurestime,powercom,powerposition,feedstatus,filltime,debug,feeduid) values
(#{s.ip},#{s.sensorId},#{s.sensor_type},#{s.position},#{s.maxvalues},#{s.maxtime},#{s.avgvalue},#{s.starttime},#{s.endtime},#{s.times},#{s.status},#{s.measures},#{s.measurestime},#{s.powercom},#{s.powerposition},#{s.feedstatus},#{s.filltime},#{s.debug},0)
on duplicate key update position=values(position),maxvalues=values(maxvalues),maxtime=values(maxtime),avgvalue=values(avgvalue),endtime=values(endtime),times=values(times),measures=values(measures),measurestime=values(measurestime), powercom=values(powercom),powerposition=values(powerposition),feedstatus=values(feedstatus),filltime=values(filltime),debug=values(debug)

insert into t_sensor_alarmreport(ip,sensorId,sensor_type,position,maxvalues,maxtime,avgvalue,starttime,endtime,times,status,measures,measurestime,powercom,powerposition,feedstatus,filltime,debug,feeduid) values
(#{s.ip},#{s.sensorId},#{s.sensor_type},#{s.position},#{s.maxvalues},#{s.maxtime},#{s.avgvalue},#{s.starttime},#{s.endtime},#{s.times},#{s.status},#{s.measures},#{s.measurestime},#{s.powercom},#{s.powerposition},#{s.feedstatus},#{s.filltime},#{s.debug},0)
on duplicate key update position=values(position),maxvalues=values(maxvalues),maxtime=values(maxtime),avgvalue=values(avgvalue),endtime=values(endtime),times=values(times),measures=values(measures),measurestime=values(measurestime), powercom=values(powercom),powerposition=values(powerposition),feedstatus=values(feedstatus),filltime=values(filltime),debug=values(debug)

insert into t_sensor_alarmreport(ip,sensorId,sensor_type,position,maxvalues,maxtime,avgvalue,starttime,endtime,times,status,measures,measurestime,powercom,powerposition,feedstatus,filltime,debug,feeduid) values
(#{s.ip},#{s.sensorId},#{s.sensor_type},#{s.position},#{s.maxvalues},#{s.maxtime},#{s.avgvalue},#{s.starttime},#{s.endtime},#{s.times},#{s.status},#{s.measures},#{s.measurestime},#{s.powercom},#{s.powerposition},#{s.feedstatus},#{s.filltime},#{s.dubug},#{s.feeduid})
on duplicate key update position=values(position),maxvalues=values(maxvalues),maxtime=values(maxtime),avgvalue=values(avgvalue),endtime=values(endtime),times=values(times),measures=values(measures),measurestime=values(measurestime), powercom=values(powercom),powerposition=values(powerposition),feedstatus=values(feedstatus),filltime=values(filltime),debug=values(debug)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_sensor_alarmreport WHERE status=#{status} AND filltime=#{filltime}
